1.21A
  • May (attempt to) Deploy Good Order squads, if Good Order leader present, and/or Unarmed/Guards/Finns/Carrier HS/USMC 7-6-8's without leader (A1.31; G17.11).
  • Infantry MMC may attempt to Scrounge abandoned vehicles or non-burning wrecks (D10.5).
    • Place Scrounged and TI markers.

1.24A
  • Determine final Drop Point for each Para Wing, then place all Sticks (i.e. Parachutes; E9.12) on-board, in Aerial Locations.
